purpleculture_pinyin:
lù
diary; record; to hit; to copy
дневник; записывать; ударить; копировать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 录)
Antonyms: 放
Ideographic: A metal 釒 brush 彔 used to record stories
purpleculture_examples:
錄取 [ lù qǔ ]: to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam; to admit (a student); to hire (a job candidate)
錄用 [ lù yòng ]: to hire (an employee); to accept (a manuscript) for publication
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 彔 [ lù ] to carve wood
heisig_chinese_memo: The metal snowman sets the record for longest time without melting.
Ru_trainchinese: lù: (глаг/сущ) записывать на пленку/видео; записывать, делать записи; принимать на работу; записи, собрание
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Last year the record was broken at the broom snowflake sweeping competition.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " gold " to "彔" sound. The original meaning is gold. "Shuowen": "Record, golden. From gold, distress." Duan Yucai's note: ""Record" and "green" are the same pronunciation, and gold is in Qianhuang Zhixian. "Borrowed as a provincial record." After " recording ", it is assumed to be recorded. Such as "Han Feizi. "Overall": "A hero is not famous in books, and he does not record his merits in Panyu, but records the emptiness of the year." "Han Shu. "Yiwenzhi": "Each book has been written by Xiang Fu, summarizing its meaning, and recording it."

The extension of " record " refers to the records and books. For example, one of Tao Yuanming's "Preliminary Elegy" in the Eastern Jin Dynasty: "We were the same person last night, and today we are recording ghosts." "The Yan Family Instructions. "Saving trouble": "The classics are not enough to be asked, the history is not enough to discuss, the articles cannot be passed on to the collection, and the writings are not worthy of keeping love."

" Record " also means review and measurement. Such as "Han Shu. "The Biography of Dong Zhongshu": "According to the measurement of talents and awarding officials, recording morality and positioning." "Book of the Later Han Dynasty. The Biography of Deng, Zhang, Xu, Zhang and Hu: "(Zhang Yu) traveled through the counties and towns, and there is no end to the deep and secluded places. He recorded prisoners personally, and he did many things.

" Enrolled " means admission and employment. Such as "Lun Heng. "Bietong": "The writings of the descendants of the ancient sages and sages, and the emphasis is not on the books of the fathers and brothers of the disciples. They may be taken by observation or donation or not recorded." Biography of Huan Rong Ding Hong: "(Huan) Yu Shu enters loyalty, and it is often found in Nalu." It also means appointment. Such as "Sui Shu. "Biography of Pei Renji": "The Sui Dynasty was in great chaos, and those with merits were not recorded."

" Record " means collection and collection. Such as "Baopuzi. "On the Secular": "Also take the method of returning the Danjinye, if you want to stay in the world, but take half of it and record half of it." "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Political Affairs": "Official bamboos are all ordered to record thick heads, and the accumulation is like a mountain."

" Record " means general and commander. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "He Di Ji": "Da Si Nong Yin Mu is a lieutenant, and records the book affairs." Li Xian's note: "Record, that is the general." "Wen Xin Diao Long. "Secretary": "The recorder, the leader. The ancient history book, compiled with a brief strategy, and the number of names, so it is called the record."

" Lu " also means arrest. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. "Political Affairs": "Wang Anqi served as Donghai County, and the officials recorded a night offender." "Night offender" refers to a person who violated the night travel ban. "Southern Qi Book. "The Biography of Wang Jingze": "Another thief was recorded. He called his relatives to the front whip and made the thief sweep the streets."

" Record " means copying. Such as "Song History. "The Biography of Li Jihe": "Jilong dismissed his arms and hand-recorded the legacy of Tang Li Ji's inheritance." Chapter 38 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "I took another Xuelang paper and transcribe it together. Add someone’s number below."
humanum_short_description_en: From " gold " to "彔" sound. The original meaning is gold, and later it was borrowed to indicate record.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「彔」聲。本義是金色。《說文》：「錄，金色也。从金，彔聲。」段玉裁注：「『錄』與『綠』同音，金色在靑黃之閒也。叚借為省錄字。」「錄」後被假借表示記錄。如《韓非子．大體》：「豪傑不著名於圖書，不錄功於盤盂，記年之牒空虛。」《漢書．藝文志》：「每一書已，向輒條其篇目，撮其指意，錄而奏之。」

　　「錄」引申表示記錄的簿籍、書冊。如東晉陶淵明〈擬挽歌辭〉之一：「昨暮同為人，今旦在鬼錄。」《顏氏家訓．省事》：「經不足以待問，史不足以討論，文章無可傳於集錄，書迹未堪以留愛翫。」

　　「錄」又表示審查、衡量。如《漢書．董仲舒傳》：「量材而授官，錄德而定位。」《後漢書．鄧張徐張胡列傳》：「（張禹）歷行郡邑，深幽之處莫不畢到，親錄囚徒，多所明舉。」

　　「錄」表示錄取、錄用。如《論衡．別通》：「古聖先賢遺後人文字，其重非徒父兄之書也，或觀讀采取，或棄捐不錄。」《後漢書．桓榮丁鴻列傳》：「（桓）郁數進忠言，多見納錄。」又表示任用。如《隋書．裴仁基傳》：「時隋大亂，有功者不錄。」

　　「錄」表示收藏、收集。如《抱樸子．對俗》：「又服還丹金液之法，若且欲留在世間者，但服半劑而錄其半。」《世說新語．政事》：「官用竹皆令錄厚頭，積之如山。」

　　「錄」表示總領、統領。如《後漢書．和帝紀》：「大司農尹睦為大尉，錄尚書事。」李賢注：「錄，謂總領之也。」《文心雕龍．書記》：「錄者，領也。古史世本，編以簡策，領其名數，故曰錄也。」

　　「錄」也表示逮捕。如《世說新語．政事》：「王安期作東海郡，吏錄一犯夜人來。」「犯夜人」指觸犯夜行禁令的人。《南齊書．王敬則傳》：「又錄得一偷，召其親屬於前鞭之，令偷身長掃街路。」

　　「錄」表示謄抄。如《宋史．李繼和傳》：「繼隆罷兵柄，手錄唐李勣遺戒授繼和。」《紅樓夢》第38回：「另拿了一張雪浪箋過來，一併謄錄出來，某人作的，底下贅明某人的號。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「彔」聲。本義是金色，後被假借表示記錄。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
錄 (Simplified: 录)
Pinyin: lù
English Definition: diary; record; to hit; to copy
Antonyms: 放
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 金
Ideographic: A metal 釒 brush 彔 used to record stories
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 彔 [ lù ] to carve wood
Example Words:
錄取 [ lù qǔ ]: to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam; to admit (a student); to hire (a job candidate)
錄用 [ lù yòng ]: to hire (an employee); to accept (a manuscript) for publication
More: 錄* | *錄 | *錄*

Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 放
Ideographic: A metal 釒 brush 彔 used to record stories
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 彔 [ lù ] to carve wood
①記載，抄寫：記錄。載錄。抄錄。錄供。
②記載言行或事物的書冊：語錄。目錄。回憶錄。
③採取，任用：錄取。收錄。錄用。甄錄(經審查鑑別而任用)。
錄取 [ lù qǔ ]: to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam; to admit (a student); to hire (a job candidate)
錄用 [ lù yòng ]: to hire (an employee); to accept (a manuscript) for publication

Ideographic: A metal 釒 brush 彔 used to record stories
HSK: 5
Freq: 6920
Chinese: The metal snowman sets the record for longest time without melting.
Meaning: record
Hanzi: 录
Story: Last year the record was broken at the broom snowflake sweeping competition.
Kind: traditional

從「 金 」，「 彔 」聲。本義是金色。《說文》：「錄，金色也。从金，彔聲。」段玉裁注：「『錄』與『綠』同音，金色在靑黃之閒也。叚借為省錄字。」「 錄 」後被假借表示記錄。如《韓非子．大體》：「豪傑不著名於圖書，不錄功於盤盂，記年之牒空虛。」《漢書．藝文志》：「每一書已，向輒條其篇目，撮其指意，錄而奏之。」 「 錄 」引申表示記錄的簿籍、書冊。如東晉陶淵明〈擬挽歌辭〉之一：「昨暮同為人，今旦在鬼錄。」《顏氏家訓．省事》：「經不足以待問，史不足以討論，文章無可傳於集錄，書迹未堪以留愛翫。」 「 錄 」又表示審查、衡量。如《漢書．董仲舒傳》：「量材而授官，錄德而定位。」《後漢書．鄧張徐張胡列傳》：「（張禹）歷行郡邑，深幽之處莫不畢到，親錄囚徒，多所明舉。」 「 錄 」表示錄取、錄用。如《論衡．別通》：「古聖先賢遺後人文字，其重非徒父兄之書也，或觀讀采取，或棄捐不錄。」《後漢書．桓榮丁鴻列傳》：「（桓）郁數進忠言，多見納錄。」又表示任用。如《隋書．裴仁基傳》：「時隋大亂，有功者不錄。」 「 錄 」表示收藏、收集。如《抱樸子．對俗》：「又服還丹金液之法，若且欲留在世間者，但服半劑而錄其半。」《世說新語．政事》：「官用竹皆令錄厚頭，積之如山。」 「 錄 」表示總領、統領。如《後漢書．和帝紀》：「大司農尹睦為大尉，錄尚書事。」李賢注：「錄，謂總領之也。」《文心雕龍．書記》：「錄者，領也。古史世本，編以簡策，領其名數，故曰錄也。」 「 錄 」也表示逮捕。如《世說新語．政事》：「王安期作東海郡，吏錄一犯夜人來。」「犯夜人」指觸犯夜行禁令的人。《南齊書．王敬則傳》：「又錄得一偷，召其親屬於前鞭之，令偷身長掃街路。」 「 錄 」表示謄抄。如《宋史．李繼和傳》：「繼隆罷兵柄，手錄唐李勣遺戒授繼和。」《紅樓夢》第38回：「另拿了一張雪浪箋過來，一併謄錄出來，某人作的，底下贅明某人的號。」
